title: Голоса
overview: As a result of a terrible personal drama, Lizaveta Zaretskaya developed the ability to read other people's thoughts. She was always on the way to this. But only great grief opened a certain shutter in her consciousness. After the disappearance of her only daughter Dasha, Liza's life turned into hell. And only her work in the department for the search for people keeps her in this world. And also a weak hope of finding Dasha...
